ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Pardeepinder Singh has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently he is employed as a Sr.JAVA Developer at Jasper Wireless. Pardeepinder has extensive knowledge of Java, XML, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, Enterprise Java Beans, Spring Framework, HTML, Oracle PL/SQL, Java Server Pages, Data Access Object, Log4j, Hibernate, JDBC, WSDL, Rational Rose, Java Servlets, ECLiPSe, UML/OMT, JUnit, JNDI, SOAP, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, JavaScript, DHTML, C++, Ant, UDDI, Stored Procedures, XHTML, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, SQL, jQuery, Struts Web Application Framework, Service Oriented Architecture, Scrum Methodology, Oracle 11g, Java Messaging Service, EXT JS, Class Diagrams, Agile Methodology, XSL, WebSphere Studio Application Developer, SAX, REST, Oracle 10G, Oracle, MySQL, JProfiler, C Programming Language, AJAX, Web Services, WAS 5.1, VMware, UNIX, Ruby, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft SQL Server, MVC, JSTL, Cascading Style Sheets, CVS, BlackBerry, shell scripting, WebSphere MQ, Web 3.0, Waterfall Methodology, Sun Solaris, Software Development Life Cycle, Siemens Hardware, Selenium, Rational ClearQuest, Rational ClearCase, Oracle 9i, MongoDB, MVC Architecture, MS Visual SourceSafe, Java RMI, Java Enterprise Edition, JDK, Ivy, IBM Hardware, DB2, Core Java, Business Objects, Business Delegate, BEA, Avaya switches, Activity Diagrams. So far Pardeepinder has not gained any managerial experience.
